pullrequest.title: Update to starting pen and lighting in task 2

content.raw:
I agree, the mud shadow is kind of disturbing. Casting shadows could be disabled using the ``<cast_shadows>`` tag I suppose?
Edit: I just tried it with  ``<cast_shadows>false</cast_shadows>`` assigned to the mud plane and it looks much better.

Overall the shadows seem kind of dark but that shouldn't be a problem (well, maybe some team that uses color segmentation for rubble detection will complain, lol). The rubble shading looks nicer now than before though.

As a side note: has DARPA seen the new starting pen? Everyone I've shown the starting pen to so far associates it with a crime scene. Not sure whether that's a good thing for publicity. ;)
